last_episode_to_air.name: The Trink
last_episode_to_air.overview: Before the brewery gears up for a big beer festival, Wilhelm and Adam must decide between business or brotherhood.

name: Brews Brothers
overview: Two rival brothers must work together to keep their brewery in business, but shenanigans keep foaming up their company with chaos.

episodes.name: The Brothers Rodman
episodes.overview: Brewery owner Wilhelm Rodman gets a visit from his polar-opposite brother, Adam, but the unpleasant reunion is cut short by a bigger crisis.

episodes.name: Recreate the Opus
episodes.overview: When Rodman's brewery must replicate a golden recipe, Wilhelm handles some free-spirited customers and Adam probes the past of his coworker Sarah.

episodes.name: Taste of Van Nuys
episodes.overview: A tour bus inspires Sarah to take charge at the brewery, but the drive to boost sales hits a snag thanks to Adam and their coworker Chuy.

episodes.name: Monk Monday
episodes.overview: Adam's newest beer masterpiece is too expensive to brew, but a group of visiting monks from Wilhelm's past could offer the solution he needs.

episodes.name: LA's Best Nose
episodes.overview: Wilhelm searches for someone to represent the brewery at a beer tasting competition while Adam's first time leads to trouble for everyone.

episodes.name: Lazlo Suna
episodes.overview: With a whopping offer, the brewery's debate between releasing their first beer in a bottle versus a can erupts into an unpleasurable situation.

episodes.name: Krachtbal
episodes.overview: Wilhelm serves a biker crew that endorses one of his beers with a curious sense of pride. Meanwhile, Sarah finds her artistic voice.

episodes.name: The Trink
episodes.overview: Before the brewery gears up for a big beer festival, Wilhelm and Adam must decide between business or brotherhood.
